original_text: When Saul was Israel's king, the men of Reuben's tribe attacked the Hagrites. They won the fight. Then they moved into their land to live. That was the whole region that was east of Gilead.
korean_text: 사울 왕 때에 그들이 하갈 사람과 더불어 싸워 손으로 쳐죽이고 길르앗 동쪽 온 땅에서 장막에 거주하였더라

sentences.original_text: the men of Reuben's tribe attacked the Hagrites
sentences.korean_translation: 르우벤 지파 사람들이 하그리트 사람들을 공격했다

sentences.original_text: Then they moved into their land to live
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그들은 그 땅으로 이사가 살았다
